TEXT.English: A [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great General[COLOR_REVERT] may become a Warlord by joining another unit in the field and giving a one-time combat experience to units in the same tile.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大军事家[COLOR_REVERT]能够与特定单位结合为一体，并为所在地块的其他单位提供一次性的作战经验奖励。
作为军事统帅直接指挥军队

TEXT.English: Gives a Total of %d1_Num Experience to Units in the Same Tile
TEXT.Chinese: 为所在地块的单位提供%d1_Num经验(总计)

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Can Provide %d1_Num Experience to Units in the Same Tile
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]为所在地块的单位提供%d1_Num经验
当与特定单位结合之后:
[ICON_BULLET]牺牲人口造成不满的持续时间%D1_percent%%

TEXT.English: We are waiting for %s1_Names to reconnect to the game. If you would like to stop waiting, please vote on how to proceed.
TEXT.Chinese: 正在等待%s1_Names连接到游戏。 如果不希望继续等待，请投票决定处理方式。

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Targets any %s1_unit_list first in combat outside cities
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]在野外作战时以%s1_unit_list为首要目标

TEXT.English: %s1_vassal_name has agreed to become a vassal state of %s2_master_name
%s1_team_name is no longer able to protect you. You are once again an independent state.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_team_name已无法继续提供保护。我们又恢复为完全独立的国家。

TEXT.English: %s1_team_name claims insufficient protection. They are no longer your vassal state.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_team_name宣称未获得充分的保护。对方已不再是你的附庸。

TEXT.English: %s1_team_vassal has renounced the protection of %s2_team_master and is once again a free state.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_team_vassal宣布拒绝%s2_team_master继续提供保护，恢复为完全独立的国家。

TEXT.English: It appears you are too weak to protect us, so we no longer have any interest in being your Vassal State. What are you going to do about it?
TEXT.Chinese: 显然你的力量不足以保护我们，因此我们不希望继续作为你的附庸。你将如何反应？

TEXT.English: A "madrassa" is an Arabic institute of higher learning, usually religious in nature. The earliest madrasses were formed in Islamic mosques, where scholars gathered to study and debate religious and secular issues of the day. Over time students would come to study with the most learned scholars; the most popular teachers often had to construct separate buildings to hold their growing student population.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]At the madrassas the students would learn to read and write and study religious doctrine, history and law. Some madrassas also taught logic, world history, foreign language, mathematics, art and science. Since state-run colleges and universities did not appear until later in history, the madrassas were critical centers of learning in many early Arabic cities.
TEXT.Chinese: “伊斯兰学校”（madrassa）是一种具有宗教性质的高等学校。早期的伊斯兰学校存在于伊斯兰清真寺内，学者们聚集在一起研究辩论宗教问题和世俗日常事务。学生可以向那些最有学问的学者讨教。那些最受欢迎的老师经常不得不建造更多的单独的教室来容纳越来越多的学生。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]在伊斯兰学校里，学生将会学习宗教信条、历史和法律。某些伊斯兰学校也教授逻辑学、世界历史、外国语、数学、艺术和自然科学。在公立大学和学院没有出现之前，伊斯兰学校是许多早期阿拉伯城市的学术中心。

TEXT.English: A "pavilion" is a covered building without surrounding walls (think of it as a roof supported by columns). This kind of structure has been extremely popular for centuries in China, where they are often found in parks and gardens as well as in temple complexes. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The first Chinese pavilions were probably constructed during the "Zhou dynasty," and they became quite numerous during the Warring States Period (approximately 400-200 BC). At first these buildings may have been used as watchtowers, providing soldiers with an uninterrupted 360-degree view along with shelter from rain and snow, but in later periods they were incorporated into Chinese gardens and parks, where they were prized for their elegance and simplicity of design.
TEXT.Chinese: 舞榭是一种采用“中国亭阁”建筑形式的娱乐场所——所谓“亭阁”（pavilion）是一种有顶盖而没有围墙（可以想象为几个石柱支撑的屋顶）的建筑，这种建筑在中国流行了很多个世纪，在各种公共和私人园林及豪华宫殿之中经常会建有“亭阁”。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]建造“亭阁”的历史可以追溯至周代，到战国时期（约公元前400-公元前200年）这类建筑就已经很普遍了。起初，这类建筑的作用是作为能遮挡雨雪而且保持全面视野的瞭望台，但到后来，它优雅而简易的特性使其成为中国园林中最常见的建筑形式之一。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]（塞爱维小提示：该中国特色建筑原文作“亭阁”，但“亭阁”替代“剧场”似乎不太适宜，因此我们改成同为歌舞娱乐设施的“舞榭”——舞者与观者同处亭阁之中，与湖光山色融为一体……）

TEXT.English: In the sixteenth and seventeenth centuries, the French nobility used to gather the local "intelligentsia" to discuss the literary or artistic works of the day. The word "salon" refers to the reception room where these parties were held. The salons were almost always organized by the most beautiful, intelligent and rich women in the French nobility. During the seventeenth centuries the two most important literary salons were run by Madame de Rambouillet and her rival, Madeleine de Scudery. Virtually every important French author, poet, artist and scientist attended one or the other of these gatherings, making them the very centers of French intellectual thought.
TEXT.Chinese: 在16、17世纪，法国贵族经常邀集当地的知识分子到自己的宅邸，共同讨论当代的文学和艺术。“沙龙”（salon）这个词就是指举行这类聚会的厅室。那些美貌智慧或者富有的法国贵族女士也经常组织沙龙。在17世纪有两个最重要的沙龙，主持它们的是德洪布耶夫人和她的对手斯居代里。事实上每个重要的法国作家、诗人、艺术家或者自然科学家都参与过类似的聚会，使得沙龙成为法国知识和思想的中心。

TEXT.English: An assembly plant is a building or complex of buildings where workers build goods from their component parts, which are created on-the-spot or in factories elsewhere. In many cases the goods are assembled using an "assembly line" style of production in which individual parts are added to the product by a number of workers, each of whom performs his or her actions in sequence as the product moves down the production line. The plant also may include a warehouse to store parts as well as the finished products.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Although a relative latecomer to the Industrial Revolution and manufacturing in general, by the early twentieth century the German plants were among the most efficient in the world. During the First and Second World Wars German plants built thousands of tanks, planes, and other war materiel under horrendous conditions and in the face of concentrated Allied bombing attacks. Into the twenty-first century the German manufactories remain among the world's best.
TEXT.Chinese: 装配工厂由单个厂房或者一组厂房建筑构成，工人们将本厂生产的、或是从其他工厂进货的零件组装成产品。装配工厂往往采用“生产流水线”进行装配，在“生产流水线”上，整个装配工作被分割成若干道工序，每个工人只在流水线上完成自己的一部分工序。装配工厂有时也包括储存货物的仓库。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]尽管德国在工业革命时代中是一个后起者，但到了20世纪早期，德国工厂已处于世界上最有效率的工厂之列。在一战和二战期间，德国工厂生产了成千上万的坦克、飞机和其他战略物资，而且这些成就都是在非常艰难的条件——例如盟军的集中轰炸之下完成的。进入21世纪，德国的制造业仍然是世界一流的。

TEXT.English: Modern western drama was created in Greece around 530 BC, evolving from the "dithyramb," a fertility ritual of songs, poems and dances offered to the Greek god Dionysus. An "Odeon" is a large, open-aired structure in which such performances were held. The audience sat in a semicircle of seats around a central paved "dancing square" (orchestra). The first row of seats was reserved for important officials or priests. There was usually an altar dedicated to Dionysus somewhere in the odeon. The "logeion" was a small raised platform where the performers acted (the original dramas had at most three or four actors; the size of the stage would increase as later plays required bigger casts).
TEXT.Chinese: 西方现代戏剧的诞生可以追溯到约公元前530年时的古希腊，由“酒神赞歌”（dithyramb）逐渐演化而来——这是为庆祝丰收、向酒神狄俄尼索斯献祭而举行的一种表演仪式，包括歌唱、诗朗颂和舞蹈等等。古希腊的“露天剧场”（odeon）是一种大型开放式建筑，专门用于举行这类演出。听众坐在四周的看台之上，中间是演出的舞台。看台的第一排座位是为重要的官员和祭司准备的。在歌剧院里面有专门用于祭拜酒神的祭坛。“舞台”是一块高起的小平台，用于演员演出（最初的戏剧最多只有三四个演员；随着后来的发展，需要的演职人员也越来越多。）

TEXT.English: Much of the Incan empire was located on the steep slopes of the Andes Mountains. Such terrain posed a significant challenge to agriculture, as constant soil erosion made the ground less fertile, and heavy rains were quite likely to wash away the current crops (as well as the soil they stood on). Very early on, the Incan farmers mastered the art of constructing terraces upon which to grow their crops. These terraces created much flatter ground upon which to farm, which resulted in less soil erosion and greatly increased production.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Creation of farming terraces in such steep terrain required a good deal of engineering skill (to build the necessary retaining walls), as well as an abundance of cheap manual labor and a sophisticated knowledge of irrigation. They were well worth the effort, however, and with them the Incans were able to sustain thriving cities in locations that other civilizations would have found totally inhospitable.
TEXT.Chinese: 印加帝国的大部分领地都坐落于安第斯山脉的峭壁陡坡之上。这样的地理环境对农业是一个严峻的挑战，持续的土壤侵蚀使得土地贫瘠，过多的大雨会冲掉生长中的农作物（同样会冲掉的是它们所扎根的土壤）。在很早的时候，印加的农民就掌握了修建梯田种植庄稼的方法，梯田能减少土壤侵蚀，从而使粮食产量大幅增加。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]在山坡上建造梯田，需要很多工程技术（需要用于构筑固定梯田的护墙）、大量的廉价劳动力以及丰富的灌溉知识。然而，这一切努力都是值得的，依靠梯田印加人在其他文明所不感兴趣的贫瘠土地上建造了一座座繁荣的城市。

TEXT.English: A "mausoleum" is a large and ornate building constructed to hold the remains of a person of importance, typically a leader, warlord, or extremely wealthy merchant. Mausoleums can be found in many ancient civilizations, where they played both a sacred and political role - seeking to awe the viewer with the power and wealth of the state (or the individual). The Egyptian pyramids are essentially huge mausoleums built to hold the remains of pharaohs.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Throughout history Indian leaders have constructed extensive mausoleums for themselves and their relatives. Perhaps the best known of these is the Taj Mahal, built in the seventeenth century by the Mughal Emperor Shah Jahan to house the remains of his beloved wife, Mumtaz Mahal.
TEXT.Chinese: 陵墓是一种用于安葬重要人物（国家领袖、军事首领或是超级巨富）的大型豪华建筑。许多古代文明都曾修建过陵墓，它同时具有宗教和政治两方面的作用——使参观者被国家（或是个人）的力量和财富所震慑。埃及的金字塔就是用以安置法老遗体的巨型陵墓。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]历史上的印度王公们也为自己修建过无数陵墓，但其中最有名的也许要算沙贾汗在17世纪为自己的宠妃修建的泰姬陵。

TEXT.English: In the early half of the twentieth century, Japan was fast becoming one of the most industrialized nations in the world. As such, Japan needed access to fossil fuels to run her factories, energy plants, and vehicles, especially her growing navy. Much of Japan's colonization/conquest efforts during that period were designed to gain control over areas rich in such resources. Conflict between Japan and the United States - another growing Pacific industrial power - over these resources was one of the root causes of the Second World War (or the Pacific theatre portion of that war, anyway).[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Shale is a compound formed of decayed and compacted organic material much like other fossil fuels. However, shale requires a good deal of preparation before it becomes an adequate fuel, making it much more expensive than petroleum. However, lacking easy access to high-quality coal and petroleum during the pre-war period, the Japanese constructed a number of plants designed to create fuel from shale. The shale plant in occupied Manchuria was capable of producing as much as 200,000 tons of shale oil per year. Such plants kept the Japanese navy afloat during its long struggle with the larger and resource-rich United States.
TEXT.Chinese: 在20世纪前半叶，日本是世界上工业化程度最高的国家之一。它需要大量化石型燃料为工厂、发电站、机动车辆以及庞大的海军提供能源。日本在这个时期进行的殖民和征服都是为了获得盛产资源的地区。日本和泛太平洋地区另一强国——美国之间围绕着这些资源发生的冲突，这也是第二次世界大战（至少是太平洋战争）的起因之一。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]油页岩与其他化石型燃料一样，也是一种以腐败的生物为主要成分经漫长地质作用形成的混合物。然而，油页岩在使用之前必须经过特定的加工，这使它的价格远高于石油。但是，由于缺少高质量的煤炭和石油，日本修建了许多工厂，希望从油页岩中提取燃料。在当时日本占领下的中国东北每年可以从油页岩中提供20余万吨油料，以支持日本海军与资源丰饶的美国所进行的长期战争。

TEXT.English: As nomadic tribesmen (and later as cavalry-based conquerors), the Mongolians' survival was dependent upon the quality of their horses and the skill of their riders. A warhorse must be extensively trained if it is to be successfully used in battle. In their natural state, most horses quite sensibly seek to run away from dangerous situations - say, when surrounded by screaming men armed with sharp objects. A cavalryman's horse, on the other hand, needs to be able to suppress this instinct and instead instantly carry out any order given it by its rider - no matter how suicidal. Such training takes time and skill - for both mount and rider. Mongolian stables - built in the ubiquitous Mongolian yurt (or "ger") tents - provide such training.
TEXT.Chinese: 作为一个游牧民族（后来又成为马背上的征服者），蒙古人的生存主要依赖于马匹和骑手的素质。战马在投入战斗前必须经过长时间的训练。马的天性是一遇到危险情况就会逃跑，换句话说，每当被手持锋利武器、口中大声呼喝的人包围时，它们就会这么做。但是作为战马，就必须克服自己的本能，当接到骑手的指令后，无论处于什么境况都必须执行。对战马的训练需要时间和技巧，对马匹和骑手来说都是如此。遍布草原的蒙古毡帐旁的马厩就可以提供这样的训练。

TEXT.English: Roman civic and commercial life was largely centered upon the "forum," an open space surrounded by markets, temples, government buildings, and the "rostra," a platform where Romans made political speeches to their fellows. The Roman forums may have been modeled upon the "agoras," which served much the same purposes in earlier Greek cities. The most famous forum is the "Roman Forum," located at the center of the Imperial City, but most other Roman cities had them as well.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The Roman Forum in Rome contained a number of very important and beautiful buildings, including temples devoted to Romulus, Saturn and Vesta, several basilicas, and the "Curia Hostilia," which housed the Roman Senate.
TEXT.Chinese: 罗马人的政治和商业生活都是围绕着中心广场展开，中心广场周围一般是市场、神庙、政府建筑，以及公共讲坛——罗马人进行政治讲演的场所最著名的广场就是罗马中心广场，它位于帝国首都的中心，其它罗马城市也有相似的广场。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]罗马的中心广场包括了大量重要而又美丽的建筑物，例如罗马城的建立者罗穆卢斯、农神萨杜恩、灶神维斯塔以及其它许多神祗的神庙，罗马元老院自然也座落于此。

TEXT.English: Russian scientific research has a long and storied history. The great seventeenth century Russian artist and scientist Mikhail Lomonosov (1711-1765) helped create the University of Moscow, one of the great scientific research institutions of the world. Tsar Peter the Great founded the prestigious Russian Academy of Science by decree in 1724.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]When the Communists took over Russia in the early twentieth century they placed great emphasis upon modernizing and industrializing the Soviet Union, and they heavily funded scientific research. Though initially well behind their European and American counterparts, Russian scientists quickly caught up, and in some areas - especially in the theoretical sciences - surpassed their colleagues in the West.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The collapse of the Soviet Union in the latter half of the twentieth century did great damage to scientific research; however, as Russia regains economic strength, it can be expected her scientists, universities and research institutions will once again be among the leaders in the world.
TEXT.Chinese: 俄罗斯的科学研究有着悠久的历史。俄国伟大的艺术家兼科学家米哈伊尔·罗蒙诺索夫（1711-1765）就曾经参与了莫斯科大学的建设，后者也成为了世界闻名的科研机构。彼得大帝则于1724年设立了享有盛名的俄罗斯科学院。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]当布尔什维克在二十世纪初统治俄罗斯之后，他们将精力投入到全苏联的工业化和现代化进程上，大力开展科学研究。尽管当时苏联与欧美列强的科技水平相差甚远，但他们很快就迎头赶上，甚至在以理论科学等领域还超过了西方国家。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]这个红色帝国在二十世纪后半段的崩溃对科学研究造成了极大破坏；不过，随着俄罗斯经济的复苏，国内的科学家、大学以及研究机构再一次以领袖姿态出现在世界舞台上。

TEXT.English: Throughout history, men have built fortified structures to protect themselves from external enemies. These structures have taken many forms over the years, from simple ditches and walls to medieval castles to huge and complex "star" fortresses designed to protect against muskets and cannon. Citadels are large castle-like structures built in or adjacent to cities. They are designed to defend the city against external attack, and (often) to protect the city's rulers against internal revolt.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]During the fifteenth through seventeenth centuries, Spain was a mighty colonial power with cities scattered throughout the Caribbean and Central and South America, providing Spain with (among other things) enormous quantities of silver and gold. These cities were under constant threat of attack, both from European fleets and armies as well as from native uprisings. To protect its possessions, the Spanish built a series of mighty citadels in its most important cities. When properly garrisoned and supplied, these were extremely difficult to capture. Remnants of these Spanish citadels can still be seen throughout the New World - El Castillo San Felipe del Morro, in San Juan, Puerto Rico, is a fine example of Spanish defensive works.
TEXT.Chinese: 在各个历史时期，人们修建各种坚固的防御性建筑以保护自己免受外敌的威胁。此类建筑有着多种多样的外观及构造，从最简单的壕沟和城墙，到中世纪的城堡，直到规模庞大结构复杂、足以抵御火枪和加农炮攻击的“星形”要塞等等。城防要塞（Citadel）是一种靠近城市或者城市之内修建的巨型城堡建筑。他们能帮助城市抵御外来攻击，或是帮助城市的统治者镇压国内的反叛。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]在15-17世纪候，西班牙是一个领地遍及加勒比海和中南美洲的强大殖民国家，这些殖民地为西班牙提供了大量的黄金、白银，以及各种其他资源。这些城市不断遭受来自欧洲其他国家的舰队或是原住民的威胁。为了保护其领地，西班牙人在各重要城市建造了一系列坚固的城防要塞，并配备充足的驻军和补给，想要以武力攻克这样的城防要塞是极其困难的。至今在新大陆各地依旧保存着许多西班牙城防要塞的遗址——波多黎各圣胡安市圣菲利浦·德·莫罗要塞就是其中最具代表性的一座。

TEXT.English: Of Phoenician origin, the city-state of Carthage was a mighty sea power, with a trading empire stretching across much of the Mediterranean. Carthage's wealth (and survival) depended upon the quality of its navy and merchant fleet. To protect its fleet from attack and the elements, and to improve and speed construction of new vessels, Carthage constructed two artificial harbors ("cothon") in the city, a massive effort that required the excavation of some 230,000 cubic meters of earth. One harbor was for the merchant fleet; the second was for the Carthaginian navy.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]According to ancient historians, "The harbors had communication with each other, and a common entrance from the sea seventy feet wide, which could be closed with iron chains. The first port was for merchant vessels, and here were collected all kinds of ships' tackle. Within the second port was an island, and great quays were set at intervals round both the harbor and the island. These embankments were full of shipyards which had capacity for 220 vessels."
TEXT.Chinese: 作为由腓尼基移民所建立的城邦，迦太基是一个海上强权，她的贸易网络遍及大半个地中海。迦太基的财富（及其生存）仰赖于其海军舰队和商船队的质量。为了保护商船队免遭攻击，也为了改进船型设计、加快造船速度，迦太基人掘土约230,000立方米，在城市内建成了两座人工“巨港”（cothon）。一个服务于商船队，另一个则服务于迦太基海军。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]根据古代历史学家的记载，“这两个港口之间可以互为照应，并且共享一个70英尺宽、可用铁链封锁的入海口。第一个港口是商港，集中了各种航运设施。第二个港口中央是个人工岛，港湾内部及人工岛周围遍步船坞，足够同时停靠220艘船只。”

TEXT.English: "Dun" is a Celtic word meaning, "hill-fort." The Celts began constructing duns around the seventh century BC, and remnants can be found scattered across Western Europe, England, Scotland and Ireland. Duns were typically small, squat towers constructed of dry-laid stone on raised, defensible terrain such as hills and promontories. Some were surrounded by ditches or artificial lakes.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]While many hill-forts were primitive and quite small, more extensive and complex Celtic duns have also been discovered. One such example is "Dun Carloway," on the Isle of Lewis, Scotland. This double-walled castle-like structure originally stood some thirteen meters high and fourteen meters in diameter. Maiden Castle in Dorset, England, is an extensive wall and ditch work surmounting a large hill some 47 acres in size.
TEXT.Chinese: 凯尔特语“丘堡”（Dun）意为“山丘堡垒”。 凯尔特人在公元前7世纪左右即开始建造丘堡，至今仍残留有许多遗迹、广泛分布于欧洲大陆西部、英格兰、苏格兰和爱尔兰各地。丘堡通常以石块构建的多个塔楼组成，通常选址于地势较高、利于防守的位置，例如小山和山岬。一些丘堡周围还环绕有壕沟或人工湖。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]虽然许多丘堡都造得相当粗糙和矮小，不过也有一些规模较大且结构复杂的凯尔特丘堡保存至今。其中之一就是位于苏格兰刘易斯岛上的“卡洛维丘堡”，这是一座直径14米，高约13米，拥有两层护墙的城堡式建筑。而位于英格兰多塞特的梅登城堡，则是一个建筑在一个山丘之上、占地约47英亩的庞然大物，拥有高大的城墙及宽阔的濠沟。

TEXT.English: Throughout its history, Korea has always placed great emphasis on education. The first system of formal education was created during the "Three Kingdoms" period (57 BC - 668 AD). This system was loosely based upon the education system used in Korea's northern neighbor, China. The National Confucian Academy (or "seowon"), the first state-run institution of higher learning was founded in 372 AD, and some three hundred years later another university - the National Confucian College - was founded in 660 AD. Early Korean universities emphasized the study of Chinese classics. Confucianism was an important topic of study, and it remained so even after the Koryo Dyansty adopted Buddhism as the state religion.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]In modern Korea (at least in the South) education continues to be held in high importance. There are over 300 institutes of higher education - including junior vocational colleges and colleges and universities and graduate schools - in South Korea, with enrollment in excess of two million students.
TEXT.Chinese: 高丽（朝鲜）自古以来即非常重视教育。高丽最早的正规教育体制早在“三国”时期（公元前57-公元668）就已出现。这个教育体制是仿照其北方的强邻——中国的儒家教育体制建立起来的。“三国”之一的高句丽于公元372年首度设立“太学”，同时在地方上设立传授儒学的私立书院（“私塾”）。约三百年之后的统一“三国”的新罗也设立“国学”作为最高教育机构。古代高丽的学校非常强调对中国典籍的研究。儒学思想是最主要的学习内容，甚至在高丽王朝将佛教定为官方信仰的背景之下这一状况仍然得以延续。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]在现代的朝鲜——至少是在南朝鲜（韩国），教育继续得到相当程度的重视。韩国拥有300余座高等学府——包括职业教育学院、高等专科学院、综合性大学以及研究生院等等，登记在册的高校学生数超过200万。

TEXT.English: Cleanliness was extremely important in Ottoman culture. Before modern plumbing, the Ottomans constructed communal steam baths ("hammams") throughout their major cities. In early times many of these were attached to mosques - ritual cleanliness played an important part in the Ottoman religious beliefs - in later periods they evolved into separate buildings and eventually, into enormous complexes of buildings.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The Ottoman hammams were largely modeled on their Roman and Byzantine predecessors. They contained three main areas: a hot room, a moderate room and a cool room. Both men and women could attend hammams, but they bathed in separate areas.
TEXT.Chinese: 在奥斯曼帝国的文化中，个人卫生受到相当程度的重视。在现代城市供水系统出现之前，奥斯曼帝国的主要城市就已建造了大量的公共蒸汽浴室（土耳其语“hammams”）。起初，这些土耳其浴室往往附属于某个清真寺——在进行宗教仪式前清洁身体是奥斯曼人宗教信仰的重要组成部分——后来，土耳其浴室逐渐独立出来，最终发展为庞大而复杂的建筑。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]奥斯曼土耳其浴室的建造以罗马和拜占庭的同类建筑为蓝本。主要包含三个区域，热水浴室，温水浴室和冷水浴室。男人和女人都可以使用土耳其浴室，因此三个区域也分设男区和女区。

TEXT.English: Although they did seek to extend their empire through piracy and invasion, for much of the time the Vikings were merchants, with a trading network that extended from Greenland, Iceland, and Finland into the British Isles, Western Europe, and the Mediterranean. Viking merchants are known to have traded Russian slaves at Constantinople for silks and spices, and they brought furs and ivory from far-away Greenland to ports throughout Europe, North Africa and the Middle East.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The earliest Viking trading posts were quite primitive settlements, consisting of simple dwellings and warehouses constructed of whatever local material was readily available. Over time many of the posts flourished, becoming important cities in their own rights. For example the Irish capitol of Dublin began its existence as a Viking trading post; and after being captured by the Vikings, the English city of York became a thriving trading center, second in importance only to London.
TEXT.Chinese: 虽然维京人给人留下的印象是一群无法无天的劫掠者和入侵者，但实际上大多数维京人都是从事商业活动，他们建立了一个从格陵兰、冰岛和芬兰一直延伸到不列颠群岛、西欧和地中海地区的庞大贸易网络。维京人在君士坦丁堡用俄罗斯奴隶交易丝绸和香料，将毛皮和象牙从遥远的格陵兰岛运到欧洲、北非和中东的各大港口。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]最早的维京贸易据点是些十分原始的村落，它们是由简单的房舍和用当地容易取得的材料建造的仓库组成。随时间的推移，这些贸易据点逐渐兴盛起来，发展成为成为重要的自治城市。例如爱尔兰首都都柏林当初就是一个维京贸易据点；英格兰城市约克也在被维京人占领后变成繁荣的贸易中心，其重要性仅次于伦敦。

TEXT.English: Upon ascending to power, the great Zulu leader Shaka implemented a number of important civil and military reforms to his growing civilization. In addition to his important innovations to Zulu warfare - he is often credited with the invention of the famous Zulu "buffalo horns" formation, as well as the introduction of the "iklwa," a short stabbing spear that proved enormously successful in combat - Shaka also reorganized Zulu society to better support his military ambitions.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]At the age of six, young boys joined Shaka's military as apprentice warriors. (This is a surprising parallel to the way that Spartan boys were raised - though it's unlikely that Shaka every heard of the Spartans.) The young warriors were trained in "ikhanda" (special military camps). During their training the Zulu boys were imbued with military fervor, put through rigorous physical exercise, and of course instructed in the use of the Zulu's powerful weapons. In battle they carried supplies and extra weapons for the warriors, and it is believed that they occasionally went out on hit-and-run raids against less dangerous enemy tribes. When the boys reached the appropriate age, they became full-fledged warriors. As a result the Zulu warriors were among the bravest and best-trained soldiers in the world.
TEXT.Chinese: 在获得统治权之后，伟大的祖鲁首领沙卡在整个祖鲁部族推行了一系列的社会和军事改革。除了最重要的对祖鲁人传统战术的创新——包括著名的祖鲁“牛角”阵形，以及在实战中被证明极其有效的刺杀型短矛“伊基瓦”等等——之外，沙卡还改造了祖鲁的社会组织形式，以更好地满足他的军事野心。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]祖鲁男孩年满六岁就要加入沙卡的军队做“学徒战士”。（这与古希腊斯巴达人的做法惊人地相似，虽然沙卡不大可能听说过斯巴达人。）这些少年战士在大型“特训兵营”（ikhanda）中接受训练。在训练过程中，祖鲁孩子被灌输以军事狂热，经受严格的体能训练，当然也要学习使用威力强大的祖鲁武器。在战斗中，他们为正规战士携带补给以及额外的武器，据信他们偶尔也会参与对敌方部落的袭扰活动。当孩子们达到适当的年龄，他们就会成为祖鲁军队的正式成员。因此祖鲁战士可以说是当时世界上最勇敢、最训练有素的战士之一。

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Can Provide up to %d1 XP to Each Unit in the Same Tile
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]可为所在地块的每一单位提供%d1经验

TEXT.English: Surrender and become other civ's Vassal State
TEXT.Chinese: 向其他文明投降并成为对方的附庸

TEXT.English: Oh [CT_NAME], leader of mighty [CT_CIV_SHORT], please protect [OUR_CIV_SHORT] from harm and you shall have our loyalty.
TEXT.Chinese: 哦，[CT_NAME]，强大的[CT_CIV_SHORT]的领袖，请保护[OUR_CIV_SHORT]免受侵害，我们将忠心地事奉您。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Adding to your Horde:[COLOR_REVERT] Click a unit on the right column and click Add Unit.[NEWLINE][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Removing a Unit:[COLOR_REVERT] Click a unit on the top left column and click Remove Unit. After adding a unit to your horde and exiting the screen they are permanently a member of your horde.[NEWLINE][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Buying Promotions:[COLOR_REVERT] Click on the unit in one of the left columns. Click on the promotion to purchase it. [NEWLINE][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Camp:[COLOR_REVERT] You begin with a Camp. All units you purchase begin at the camp.[NEWLINE][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Naval Units:[COLOR_REVERT] To purchase a naval unit your camp must be at the shoreline of a body of water. The unit will be placed on one of the water plots.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]加入你的部落：[COLOR_REVERT]先点右侧列表栏中的单位，再点“添加单位”。[NEWLINE][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]移除单位：[COLOR_REVERT]先点左侧列表栏中的单位，再点“移除单位”。将单位加入你的部落并退出该界面后，该单位将由你掌控。 [NEWLINE][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]购买晋升：[COLOR_REVERT] 先点左侧列表栏中的单位，再点可用晋升以购买晋升。 [NEWLINE][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]游牧营地：[COLOR_REVERT]你在初始时拥有一个游牧营地。所有你购买的单位将出现在游牧营地中。[NEWLINE][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]海上单位[COLOR_REVERT]要购买海上单位，你的游牧营地必须位于海滨。海上单位将出现在附近水域中。

TEXT.English: The time to send these weak pathetic souls to the underworld is nearly upon us. How long will you wait?
TEXT.Chinese: 到了将这些懦弱可怜的灵魂送进地狱的时候了，你还等什么？

TEXT.English: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]VICTORY CONDITIONS[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]The objective of this scenario is to destroy Civilization. You will select the number of turns you wish to allow the game to autoplay. After the autoplay finishes, you will be taken to the Barbarian Horde screen. Use the Barbarian Horde Screen (F4) to purchase units and promotions. As you pillage, fight, and conquer civilization you will gain treasure which you can use to buy more units and promotions. You win once you have conquered all of the civilizations.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]胜利条件[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]本剧情游戏的目标不是建设文明，而是摧毁文明。你将选择希望游戏先自动进行多少个回合数，自动进行回合数完成后，你将进入蛮族部落界面。使用蛮族部落界面（F4）购买单位和晋升。通过劫掠、战斗和征服文明世界，你可以获得大笔财富以继续购买单位和晋升。征服所有文明之后赢得胜利。

TEXT.English: A camp is where new units will spawn. If you want to build naval units you must have the camp on a plot adjacent to a body of water.
TEXT.Chinese: 游牧营地可以组建新的单位。如果你要组建海上单位，则游牧营地必须邻近水域。

TEXT.English: Take control of one of Ancient China's kingdoms in an attempt to unify the country by either the pen or the sword.
TEXT.Chinese: 领导中国古代的战国七雄之一，运用武力和智慧统一天下。

TEXT.English: Relive the conquests of one of history's greatest military leaders and capture - or if you must, destroy - all of Asia.
TEXT.Chinese: 重现世界历史上一代天骄的业绩，征服——或是毁灭整个欧亚大陆。

TEXT.English: The year is 445 BC. Though recently united in the face of the terrible Persian war, that war has ended and the Greek city-states have once again resumed their never-ending internecine struggle for primacy.
TEXT.Chinese: 公元前445年——虽然曾在波斯人的大举入侵下团结到一起，但在外来威胁消除之后，希腊诸城邦又展开长期的内战。

TEXT.English: We are afraid of your enemies!
Your land is too far away
TEXT.Chinese: 你的领地距离我们太遥远

TEXT.English: Disable Vassal State Treaties, which ensure a weaker civilization protection against a stronger rival
TEXT.Chinese: 不可签订附庸条约，作为附庸国可以获得宗主国的保护

TEXT.English: Your research has located treasure in Southern Ireland.
TEXT.Chinese: 经过研究已确定爱尔兰南部宝藏的位置.

TEXT.English: Your research has located treasure in Central Ireland.
TEXT.Chinese: 经过研究已确定爱尔兰中部宝藏的位置.

TEXT.English: Your research has located treasure in Northern Ireland.
TEXT.Chinese: 经过研究已确定爱尔兰北部宝藏的位置.

TEXT.English: Your research has located treasure in Scotland.
TEXT.Chinese: 经过研究已确定苏格兰宝藏的位置.

TEXT.English: Your research has located treasure in Northern Britain.
TEXT.Chinese: 经过研究已确定不列颠北部宝藏的位置.

TEXT.English: Your research has located treasure in Central Britain.
TEXT.Chinese: 经过研究已确定不列颠中部宝藏的位置.

TEXT.English: Your research has located treasure in Southern Britain.
TEXT.Chinese: 经过研究已确定不列颠南部宝藏的位置.

TEXT.English: Your research has located treasure in Western Europe.
TEXT.Chinese: 经过研究已确定欧洲西部宝藏的位置.

TEXT.English: Your research has located treasure in Central Europe.
TEXT.Chinese: 经过研究已确定欧洲中部宝藏的位置.

TEXT.English: Your research has located treasure in Northern Europe.
TEXT.Chinese: 经过研究已确定欧洲北部宝藏的位置.

TEXT.English: [NEWLINE][SPACE][SPACE][ICON_BULLET]%D1%% Great General Emergence inside Cultural Borders
TEXT.Chinese: [NEWLINE][SPACE][SPACE][ICON_BULLET]文化边界内大军事家出现几率%D1%%

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Mod%% Great General Emergence inside Cultural Borders
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]文化边界内大军事家出现几率%D1_Mod%%

TEXT.English: Honor your Victories (exchange experience for Monuments)
TEXT.Chinese: 纪念你的辉煌胜利 (以经验点数换取纪念碑)

TEXT.English: The people of %s1_city have constructed a %s2_building to honor your victories!
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_city的居民建造了一座%s2_building以纪念你的辉煌胜利!

TEXT.English: You have honored your name and your clan with this treasure. Your exploits will be echoed in Asgard. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE][TAB]Wake early[NEWLINE][TAB]if you want[NEWLINE][TAB]another man's life or land.[NEWLINE][TAB]No lamb[NEWLINE][TAB]for the lazy wolf.[NEWLINE][TAB]No battle's won in bed.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][TAB]- The Havamal
TEXT.Chinese: 获取财富荣耀你的姓氏和家族。你的业绩将在永恒的圣境传扬。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][TAB]出发要趁早[NEWLINE][TAB]如果想得到[NEWLINE][TAB]他人的生命或土地。[NEWLINE][TAB]羔羊虽弱小[NEWLINE][TAB]懒惰的狼也只能空手而归。[NEWLINE][TAB]胜利无法在睡床上得到。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][TAB]——《哈维默》（维京古诗集）

TEXT.English: Bring treasure units to your capital to earn gold.
TEXT.Chinese: 将宝藏单位送回你的首都以将金钱收入国库.

TEXT.English: Although the earliest sailing ships were undoubtedly used for fishing and transportation, man quickly found ways to turn these vehicles into weapons. Typically, non-military vessels are no match for dedicated warships crewed with professional warriors. However, warships are expensive to build, crew and maintain, and only fairly wealthy - or bloodthirsty or desperate - nations possess large standing navies.
TEXT.Chinese: 虽然最早出现的海船无疑只是用于捕鱼和运输，但人们很快就将其变成战争的武器。在通常情况下，民用型船只是无法与配备专职士兵的战船相对抗的。不过，战船的建造、船员的配备及日常的维护代价不菲，一个国家除非是在相当富有、或穷兵黩武、或迫不得已的情况下才会保持一支庞大的海军。

TEXT.English: While the spear is a potent weapon in itself, it truly comes into power when employed in large numbers. Spears get their best effect when the warriors stand in tight formations, allowing those behind the front ranks to engage in combat as well. This however requires a good deal of training - else the soldiers are as dangerous to their cohorts as they are to the enemy.
TEXT.Chinese: 矛是一种相当有效的武器，不过只有在大量集中运用的情况下才能真正显示出威力。为了最大限度地发挥效用，矛兵需要排列成密集阵形，使得后排的战士也能加入战斗。然而，运用这样的战术需要进行大量的训练——否则很容易自乱阵脚。

TEXT.English: Spearmen reached their height of potency under the Greeks, who deployed their men in "phalanxes," remarkably tight formations in which up to five ranks of soldiers were able to engage the enemy at one time. Phalanxes required an extraordinary amount of training and discipline. Eventually as military tactics and technology advanced they would be supplanted, but in their day they were the undisputed masters of the ancient battlefield.
TEXT.Chinese: 古希腊人将矛兵的效力发挥到极致，他们将矛兵组成“希腊方阵”，这是一种高度密集的阵形，使得前五排战士能够同时加入战斗。希腊方阵需要极为严格的训练及严密的组织才能发挥威力。后来随着军事技术的发展，一度称雄古代战场的希腊方阵最终退出了历史舞台。

TEXT.English: The Year is 800 AD and you are the Viking King, Ragnar Lodbrok. The chill of the long winter bites into your fingers as you look over your fleet of longships. These boats will take you across the cold sea to your raiding destination. Do you raid for the money to provide for your children and people? Surely. Do you raid to prove yourself before your god? Possibly. Do you raid for the adventure? Definitely![PARAGRAPH:1][BOLD]Game Notes:[\BOLD]The Scenario lasts 200 turns. Your goal is to accumulate %d1 gold before the end of the game. Researching treasure locations and then returning these treasures to your capital will increase your gold.
TEXT.Chinese: 现在是公元800年，你将扮演维京人的领袖雷格那·罗德布洛克。你注视着你的庞大舰队，漫长冬季的凛冽寒风刺痛了你的手指。这些战船将载着你们穿越茫茫大海向着目标前进。这次远征是否是为了给你的子民带来财富？当然！这次远征是否是为了向你崇拜的神灵证明自己？或许！这次远征是否是为了追求冒险的刺激？没错！ [PARAGRAPH:1][BOLD]游戏提示:[\BOLD]本剧情长度为200回合。你的目标是在游戏结束前获得%d1金币。你可以通过研究获得宝藏的埋藏位置，将宝藏带回你的首都可以获得大笔金钱收入。
+%d1_Change[ICON_HAPPY]: "我们的文化影响了其他的文明!"

TEXT.English: %s1_team_vassal has broken free from %s2_team_master and is once again a free state.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_team_vassal宣布脱离%s2_team_master恢复为完全独立的国家.
[NEWLINE]领土: 宗主国的%d1%% (达到 %d2%% 将恢复独立)
[NEWLINE]人口: 宗主国的%d1%% (达到 %d2%% 将恢复独立)
[NEWLINE]领土: 原领土的%d1%% (达到 %d2%% 将恢复独立)

TEXT.English: [NEWLINE]Master Land: %d1%% of Original (Vassal breaks free at %d2%%)
TEXT.Chinese: [NEWLINE]宗主国领土: 原领土的%d1%% (降至 %d2%% 附庸国将恢复独立)

TEXT.English: For every Victory Resource your civilization controls you will receive 10 Victory points per turn.
TEXT.Chinese: 你的文明每控制一个胜利资源，将获得每回合10个胜利点数的奖励。

TEXT.English: The %s1_civ (%s2_player) demands a tribute of %s3_resource. Will you comply?
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ(%s2_player)要求我们提供%s3_resource作为贡礼。你将如何答复？

TEXT.English: Yes, anything to keep them happy
TEXT.Chinese: 好吧，尽我们的能力满足他们的要求
提洛同盟: 占领斯巴达
斯巴达同盟: 占领雅典

TEXT.English: The human members of each team will be randomly reassigned upon game launch
TEXT.Chinese: 各组队的人类玩家在游戏初始化时将随机重新分配位置

TEXT.English: The true identity of all leaders is hidden
TEXT.Chinese: 隐藏文明领袖的真实用户名

TEXT.English: As the wars between the various warring states wore on, many sought to end the constant struggle through peaceful means. Even some kings, more 'enlightened' than their warlike counterparts, wished to fight no more. One option was to have all remaining state leaders to meet together in an "Emperor's Council" and decide together who should rule all of China. Once built, the Emperor's Council will unlock the Diplomatic Victory option.
TEXT.Chinese: 无穷无尽的战争令各方都感到精疲力竭，有越来越多的人开始寻求用和平的方式结束武力。一部分比较开明的国王也对战争感到厌倦了。在连年战火中幸存下来的诸侯们建立了“会盟台”，共同商讨应该由谁来统治天下。会盟台的建成将开启外交胜利之门。

TEXT.English: Joining the war on your side is not possible for us
TEXT.Chinese: 我们不可能与你们并肩战斗

TEXT.English: Joining the war on our side is not possible for you
TEXT.Chinese: 你们不可能与我们并肩战斗

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Temples[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's happiness and culture. They are especially useful for expanding your civilization's borders during the early game.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]神庙[COLOR_REVERT]提升城市的快乐和文化点数。适宜在早期扩张你文明的边界。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Prodromoi[COLOR_REVERT] are good scouting units. They are lightly armored and extremely fast.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]轻骑兵[COLOR_REVERT]是优秀的侦察单位，具有能强的机动性。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Peltasts[COLOR_REVERT] are cheap units, useful for reinforcing tactical locations such as hills and forests.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]轻盾兵[COLOR_REVERT]造价便宜，适用于防守丘陵和森林。

TEXT.English: Time for your tribute! Refusal means WAR!
TEXT.Chinese: 快向我们缴付贡礼！否则将意味着战争！

TEXT.English: A monument is a structure that reminds people of an important event that occured in the area, or an important person - a famous general or leader, perhaps. Different cultures have constructed monuments out of varied materials - wood, stone, or even precious metals. Generally, the only ancient monuments remaining today are those made out of stone: over time the wooden monuments have decayed, and the ones constructed of precious metals have been looted and destroyed.
TEXT.Chinese: 建造纪念碑是为了使人们记住当地发生的某个重要事件、或是为了使人们记住某个重要人物——例如著名的将军或领袖等等。各个文化族群用不同的材料建造纪念碑——木材、石头，甚至贵重金属。远古时代的纪念碑通常只有那些石质的才能够保存至今：木头会腐朽，而贵重金属会被掠走。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Monuments[COLOR_REVERT] provide a small amount of culture, and are a good way to expand city borders early on.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]纪念碑[COLOR_REVERT]可提供少量文化点数，适宜在早期扩展城市的文化边界。

TEXT.English: Vassal tribute is not possible. Try again later.
TEXT.Chinese: 附庸国无法缴付贡礼。请以后再试。

TEXT.English: %s1_vassal_name has capitulated and is now a vassal state of %s2_master_name
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_vassal_name决定向%s2_master_name投降，成为对方的附庸。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Mongol Horse Archer[COLOR_REVERT] is an all-around unit which can defeat almost any army. Howeer, beware when facing entrenched units or anti-horse units like Spearmen.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]蒙古骑射手[COLOR_REVERT]是一种全能型单位，能够击败几乎任何敌人。但不要用来硬攻坚固的城防，或是专门克制骑兵的矛兵等单位。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Mounted Swordsmen[COLOR_REVERT] are designed to help fill the gaps left by Mongol Horse Archers. Use them to take out enemy Melee units like Spearmen or Swordsmen.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]马上剑士[COLOR_REVERT]可以弥补蒙古骑射手的不足。专门用来对付敌人的矛兵和剑士等肉搏单位。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Family Altar[COLOR_REVERT] provides a small culture bonus and allows 1 Priest specialist, but their most important function is to allow the construction of [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Family Emissary[COLOR_REVERT] units, vital to spreading 'bloodlines' and forging diplomatic ties.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]家祠[COLOR_REVERT]提供少量文化奖励加成，并允许供养一位神学家，最重要的作用是能够训练[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]家族使节[COLOR_REVERT]单位，用来传播“家族血脉”，加强外交联系。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Temple[COLOR_REVERT] is a cultural building which provides a small bit of Happiness to the city it's built in.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]寺庙[COLOR_REVERT]属于文化型建筑，可以为所在城市带来快乐。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Great Classical Library[COLOR_REVERT] grants 1 free technology upon completion.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]儒学典籍[COLOR_REVERT]的完成可带来1项免费科技。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Sun Tzu's Art of War[COLOR_REVERT] gives all units built on the same continent +1 Experience, good for those planning on military conquest.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]孙子兵法[COLOR_REVERT]可使所在大陆所有新建单位经验值+1，对走军事征服路线的玩家非常有用。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]National Wall[COLOR_REVERT] is a national wonder which gives every city a growth boost with +1 Population and +1 Health while also (and perhaps more importantly) preventing barbarians from crossing into your territory.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]边墙[COLOR_REVERT]属于国家级奇观，给予每座城市+1人口和+1健康的奖励，而且（这点也许更重要）可以防止蛮族越过你的边境。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Book of History[COLOR_REVERT] is a national wonder which gives the city it's built in increased Great Person generation.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]史书[COLOR_REVERT]属于国家级奇观，可使所在城市更容易产生历史伟人。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Underground Tomb[COLOR_REVERT] is a multi-faceted wonder, eliminating 75% of the War Weariness in your cities while also providing +1 free Specialists to all of your cities.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]地下陵墓[COLOR_REVERT]是具有多重作用的奇观，可以消除75%的厌战情绪，并使所有城市免费供养的专业人员数量+1。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Emperor's Council[COLOR_REVERT] is the key to the diplomatic victory. Once built a vote will be held for the leader of the Council and shortly afterwards a second for the game's diplomatic victor.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]会盟台[COLOR_REVERT]是通向外交胜利的钥匙。建成之后将首先进行盟主的推选，然后再选出最终的胜利者。

TEXT.English: The default civic with no special attributes.
TEXT.Chinese: 默认内政法令无任何特殊作用。

TEXT.English: Allows the drafting of up to 2 units per turn from each; Barracks provide +2 Happiness. Good for extra happiness or when trying to build up a military force quickly.
TEXT.Chinese: 允许每回合强制征召2个单位；兵营+2快乐。适用需要额外快乐度或迅速加强军事力量的场合。

TEXT.English: Military production 50% faster and units give +1 Happiness; Military units cost +1 gold to support. Allows for much larger armies, but can be rather expensive to maintain.
TEXT.Chinese: 军工生产速度加快50%；军事单位维持费用+1金币。允许组建更庞大的军队，但也意味着更庞大的军费开支。

TEXT.English: +200% Great Person generation in cities with State Religion; Military units cost +1 gold to support. Alternative for those who prefer domination through economics and culture rather than armies.
TEXT.Chinese: 持有官方信仰的城市历史伟人产生几率+200%；军事单位维持费用+1金币。适用于走经济文化支配路线的玩家。

TEXT.English: Provides +50% Production and Commerce in capital city. A well-rounded bonus which can be used for peaceful or wartime purposes.
TEXT.Chinese: 首都的工业产能与商业收入+50%。和平路线与战争路线下均可适用。

TEXT.English: +1 Gold from Village and Town improvements; Can spend gold to finish production. Designed to fuel an economy and make use of the extra money by turning it into production.
TEXT.Chinese: 大村与小镇+1金币；能够花费金钱加速建造。适用于走经济发展路线的玩家。

TEXT.English: +1 Food from Farm improvements; -33% Military unit production. Allows for a huge population but at the cost of penalties when building up an army.
TEXT.Chinese: 农场+1食物；军事单位建造速度-33%。有利于人口增长，但以影响军事建设为代价。

TEXT.English: All cities +2 receive Specialists. A powerful late-game civic which gives a boost to every city's economy.
TEXT.Chinese: 所有城市专业人员+2。游戏后期的一种重要内政法令，能够极大刺激经济发展。

TEXT.English: +15% Commerce in all cities. A general economic upgrade from Decentralization.
TEXT.Chinese: 所有城市商业收入+15%。是经济领域的重要进步。

TEXT.English: No Maintenance costs from distance to Capital. Mines, Workshops, Windmills and Watermills provide +1 Food. Good for large empires and those which rely on production-based plot improvements.
TEXT.Chinese: 没有因与首都距离增加而导致的维护费。矿井、工场、风力磨坊和水力磨坊+1食物。有利于大帝国的建立，以及较依赖工业类区域设施的场合。

TEXT.English: +25% Commerce in Capital and +100% Culture in all cities. Basic religion upgrade available early on.
TEXT.Chinese: 首都商业收入+25%，所有城市文化点数+100%。是早期宗教信仰领域的重要进步。

TEXT.English: All cities receive +1 Happiness from Forest plots. A good option for those suffering from Happiness problems.
TEXT.Chinese: 所有城市可因森林地块+1快乐。适用于需要提升快乐度的场合。

TEXT.English: All cities receive +2 Health. A way to curb Unhealthiness in cities.
TEXT.Chinese: 所有城市+2健康。能够有效抵销疾病的影响。

TEXT.English: All cities +33% Science. For those who make this civic a priority it can provide a massive boost to research.
TEXT.Chinese: 所有城市科研点数+33%。适用于需要加快科研速度的场合。

TEXT.English: All new units built receive +4 Experience Points. All cities +1 Unhappiness for each religion present. Enduring the happiness penalty with this civic will allow for a much more experienced and powerful army.
TEXT.Chinese: 所有新建单位经验点数+4。城市的每种信仰+1不满。此项内政法令以增加不满为代价加强军事力量。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Family Emissaries[COLOR_REVERT] are used to spread family bloodlines to cities, both your own for happiness as well as to those of others in order to gain a diplomatic advantage.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]家族使节[COLOR_REVERT]可以向其他城市传播家族血脉，用于提升本国城市的快乐度，也有利于改善外交态势。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Chariot I[COLOR_REVERT] is an early Mounted unit, designed for fast shock attacks, but it is vulnerable to [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Polearm[COLOR_REVERT] units..
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]战车I[COLOR_REVERT]是早期的骑乘单位，适用于快速发动进攻，但容易被[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]矛兵[COLOR_REVERT]所克制。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Chariot II[COLOR_REVERT] is an improved Mounted unit, designed for fast shock attacks, but remains vulnerable to [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Polearm[COLOR_REVERT] units. It has a slight power advantage over the contemporary [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Heavy Cavalry I[COLOR_REVERT], but costs more and has a smaller chance of retreating.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]战车II[COLOR_REVERT]经改良的骑乘单位，适用快速发动进攻，但仍容易被[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]矛兵[COLOR_REVERT]所克制。其战斗力略强于同时期的[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]骑射手I[COLOR_REVERT]，但成本较高，且撤退几率较低。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Heavy Cavalry I[COLOR_REVERT] unit is a fast and powerful Mounted unit, but is vulnerable to [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Polearm[COLOR_REVERT] units. It costs slightly less than the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Chariot II[COLOR_REVERT] and has a higher chance to retreat from a losing battle, but is slightly weaker in combat.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]骑射手I[COLOR_REVERT]是一种快速而强大的骑乘单位，但容易被[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]矛兵[COLOR_REVERT]所克制。其成本略低于[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]战车II[COLOR_REVERT]且战败时的撤退几率较高，但战斗力相对略差。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Heavy Cavalry II[COLOR_REVERT] unit is the ultimate Mounted unit, but remains vulnerable to [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Polearm[COLOR_REVERT] units. It is the pinnacle of fast attackers and while expensive, is strong in combat and also possesses the ability to retreat.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]骑射手II[COLOR_REVERT]是本剧情的终极骑乘单位，但仍难以同 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]矛兵[COLOR_REVERT]单位抗衡。非常适用于快速发动进攻，其战斗力很强大，且有更高撤退几率。

TEXT.English: Important in developing cities and fostering growth, the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Agriculture[COLOR_REVERT] tech unlocks the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Farm[COLOR_REVERT] plot Improvement and [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Granary[COLOR_REVERT] Building.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]农业[COLOR_REVERT]科技对促进城市发展有重要意义，启用 [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]农场[COLOR_REVERT]设施及 [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT] 粮仓[COLOR_REVERT]建筑。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Fishing[COLOR_REVERT] tech is important in building up one's economy and allowing use of the seas, allowing cities to work water plots and build the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Work Boat[COLOR_REVERT] unit.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]渔业[COLOR_REVERT]科技对经济增长有重要意义，允许利用海洋资源，允许城市居民在水域工作，并启用[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]工船[COLOR_REVERT]单位。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Archery[COLOR_REVERT] is vital for defense and military affairs, allowing the construction of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Barracks[COLOR_REVERT] Building and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Archer I[COLOR_REVERT] unit.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]弓箭[COLOR_REVERT]科技具有重要的军事意义，启用 [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]兵营[COLOR_REVERT]建筑及[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]弓手I[COLOR_REVERT]单位。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Divination[COLOR_REVERT] furthers one's internal development, allowing the creation of the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cottage[COLOR_REVERT] plot improvement, [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Library[COLOR_REVERT] Building and the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Shamanism[COLOR_REVERT] Civic, boosting Commerce and Culture.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]占卜[COLOR_REVERT]科技进一步加快发展，启用 [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]农舍[COLOR_REVERT]设施，[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]图书馆[COLOR_REVERT]建筑和[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]巫术[COLOR_REVERT]内政法令，促进商业与文化建设。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]The Wheel[COLOR_REVERT] technology has a number of benefits, allowing faster transportation via [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Roads[COLOR_REVERT], the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Pasture[COLOR_REVERT] plot Improvement and the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Chariot I[COLOR_REVERT], a fast Mounted unit.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]轮子[COLOR_REVERT]科技可带来多种好处，允许修建 [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]道路[COLOR_REVERT]更快地移动单位，启用 [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]牧场[COLOR_REVERT]设施及骑乘类单位[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]战车I[COLOR_REVERT]。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Mining[COLOR_REVERT] tech has both economic and military purposes, revealing the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Gold[COLOR_REVERT] bonus, allowing the construction of the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Mine[COLOR_REVERT] plot Improvement and the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Polearm I[COLOR_REVERT], an anti-Mounted unit.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]采矿[COLOR_REVERT]科技有经济和军事两方面作用，启用 [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]黄金[COLOR_REVERT]资源， [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]矿井[COLOR_REVERT]设施以及克制骑乘类单位的[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]矛兵I[COLOR_REVERT]。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Crop Rotation[COLOR_REVERT] provides a military boost by unlocking the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Stable[COLOR_REVERT] Building and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Feudal Levy[COLOR_REVERT] Civic, allowing military units to be produced with food, and an economic one with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Camp[COLOR_REVERT] plot Improvement.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]轮作[COLOR_REVERT]科技可为军队建设提供更强的保障，启用 [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]马厩[COLOR_REVERT]建筑以及[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]封建义务[COLOR_REVERT]内政法令，允许消耗食物组建军事单位，在经济方面则可启用 [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]猎场[COLOR_REVERT]设施。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Sailing[COLOR_REVERT] tech has a number of uses: the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Galley[COLOR_REVERT] Naval unit can transport units and help crack tough enemy defenses by bombarding cities. It also allows trade over coastal waters and allow the use or construction of a pair of economic Buildings and one Civic.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]航行术[COLOR_REVERT]科技有多种作用：允许建造[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]桨帆船[COLOR_REVERT]单位，能够运输陆上单位，还能轰击敌方城池。允许开展沿海贸易，并启用一系列经济型建筑及一项新内政法令。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Filial Piety[COLOR_REVERT] is a must for conducting diplomacy with other civs. It unlocks a number of diplomatic options along with the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Family Altar[COLOR_REVERT], vital for spreading one's 'Family Bloodine' and thus, diplomatic influence.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]孝道[COLOR_REVERT]是开展外交活动的必要前提。允许签订一系列外交协议，并启用[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]家祠[COLOR_REVERT]建筑以传播“家族血脉”、施加外交影响。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Rule of Heaven[COLOR_REVERT] is a good tech for more peaceful players, allowing the construction of two wonders and the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Bureaucracy[COLOR_REVERT] Civic which increases Production and Commerce in the Capital.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]天命[COLOR_REVERT]是实行和平路线的重要保障，启用两项新奇观以及[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]官僚制度[COLOR_REVERT]内政法令，提升首都的工业产能与商业收入。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]City States[COLOR_REVERT] tech is a good tech for players focused on economic matters, providing happiness with the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Temple[COLOR_REVERT] Building and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Daoism[COLOR_REVERT] Civic, and also unlocking the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Workshop[COLOR_REVERT] plot Improvement.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]城邦[COLOR_REVERT]科技是发展经济的重要保障，能以[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]寺庙[COLOR_REVERT]建筑提升快乐度，并启用 [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]道家[COLOR_REVERT]内政法令，并允许修建 [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]工场[COLOR_REVERT]设施。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Bronze Working[COLOR_REVERT] is primarily a military tech, revealing the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Iron[COLOR_REVERT] Bonus and allowing the construction of the production-boosting [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Forge[COLOR_REVERT] Building, but also unlocking the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Vassalage[COLOR_REVERT] Civic, which provides an XP bonus to new units.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]青铜器[COLOR_REVERT]是基本的军事科技，启用 [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]铜[COLOR_REVERT]资源以及提升工业产能的 [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT] 煅造场[COLOR_REVERT]建筑，并启用 [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]分封制度[COLOR_REVERT]内政法令，使新组建单位获得额外经验奖励。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Masonry[COLOR_REVERT] technology is good for protecting one's Civ, allowing the defensive [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Walls[COLOR_REVERT] Building as well as the Barbarian-warding [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]National Wall[COLOR_REVERT] wonder. It also unlocks the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Slavery[COLOR_REVERT] Civic, good for speeding up the construction of Units (or Buildings) at the cost of population.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]石工术[COLOR_REVERT]科技有助与加强防御能力，允许 [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]城墙[COLOR_REVERT]建筑以及[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]边墙 [COLOR_REVERT]奇观阻止蛮族入侵。并启用 [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]奴隶制度[COLOR_REVERT]内政法令，可以牺牲人工加速单位或建筑工程。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Feudalism[COLOR_REVERT] has a variety of functions, allowing the building of the important anti-Mounted [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Polearm II[COLOR_REVERT] and defensive [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Archer II[COLOR_REVERT] units, while also unlocking two production-based plot Improvements and the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Serfdom[COLOR_REVERT] Civic, which increases the rate at which [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Workers[COLOR_REVERT] complete tasks.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]封建制度[COLOR_REVERT]具有多种作用，启用专门克制骑兵的 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]矛兵II[COLOR_REVERT]以及用于防御的[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]弓手II[COLOR_REVERT]单位，允许修建两种提升产能的区域设施，并启用 [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]农奴制度[COLOR_REVERT]内政法令，可以提升[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]工人[COLOR_REVERT]的工作效率。

TEXT.English: Primarily a military-tech, [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Mathematics[COLOR_REVERT] allows the defensive [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fort[COLOR_REVERT] plot Improvement and [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Castle[COLOR_REVERT] Building, also unlocking the anti-Melee [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Crossbowman I[COLOR_REVERT] unit and the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Free Market[COLOR_REVERT] Civic, which increases the number of Trade Routes for every city.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]数学[COLOR_REVERT]科技具有重要军事意义，允许修建 [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]要塞[COLOR_REVERT]设施以及[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]城堡[COLOR_REVERT]建筑，并启用克制肉搏部队的[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]弩手I[COLOR_REVERT]单位，以及[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]自由市场[COLOR_REVERT]内政法令，可以增加城市商路数量。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Horseback Riding[COLOR_REVERT] is mostly important for its Mounted [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Heavy Cavalry I[COLOR_REVERT] unit, but also gives Specialists with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Mercantilism[COLOR_REVERT] Civic and other bonuses from the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Grocer[COLOR_REVERT] Building and the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Heroic Epic[COLOR_REVERT] National Wonder.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]骑术[COLOR_REVERT]科技启用[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]骑射手I[COLOR_REVERT]单位，并启用[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]重商主义[COLOR_REVERT]内政法令增加专业人员数量，并允许建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]杂货店[COLOR_REVERT]建筑以及国家级奇观[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]英雄史诗[COLOR_REVERT]。

TEXT.English: A more peaceful tech, [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Philosophy[COLOR_REVERT] enables [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Defensive Pacts[COLOR_REVERT] between Civs, the anti-war [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Pacifism[COLOR_REVERT] and Health-focused [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Confucianism[COLOR_REVERT] Civic but also has some bite with the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Sun Tzu's Art of War[COLOR_REVERT] World Wonder, which gives new units extra XP.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]哲学[COLOR_REVERT]允许国家间签订[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]共同防御 [COLOR_REVERT]条约，并启用反战的[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]和平主义[COLOR_REVERT]以及促进人民健康的[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]儒学[COLOR_REVERT]内政法令，还允许建造世界级奇观[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]孙子兵法[COLOR_REVERT]，为新建单位提供额外经验值。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Metal Casting[COLOR_REVERT] allows the Mounted [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Chariot II[COLOR_REVERT] unit along with the ability to spread Irrigation to plots without an adjacent source of fresh water.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]金属铸造[COLOR_REVERT]启用[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]战车II[COLOR_REVERT]单位，并使不邻近淡水的地块也获得灌溉。

TEXT.English: Important for military-minded players, [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Iron Working[COLOR_REVERT] enables the construction of the city-attacking [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Swordsman I[COLOR_REVERT] unit while additionally unlocking the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Warrior Houses[COLOR_REVERT] Civic, which allows the drafting of military units and provides Happiness with the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Barracks[COLOR_REVERT] Building. However, not to be overlooked by those more focused on economics, it also provides the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Aqueduct[COLOR_REVERT] Building, increasing the Health in a city.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]铁器[COLOR_REVERT]是重要的军事科技，允许组建专用于攻城的 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]剑士I[COLOR_REVERT]单位，并启用[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]世兵制度 [COLOR_REVERT]内政法令，可以强制征召军事单位，并使[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]兵营[COLOR_REVERT]提升快乐度。但其也有重要的经济意义，启用 [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]引水渠[COLOR_REVERT]建筑，可以提升城市的健康度。

TEXT.English: Very much focused on internal improvement, the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Independent Farmers[COLOR_REVERT] technology speeds up the progress of [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Workers[COLOR_REVERT] by 50% and also unlocks the Civic of the same name, providing a large boost to food collection at the cost of military production.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]地主[COLOR_REVERT]属于发展类科技，能使[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]工人[COLOR_REVERT]的工作效率提升50%，并启用[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]地主阶级[COLOR_REVERT]内政法令，以减缓军事建筑为代价提升食物产出。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Currency[COLOR_REVERT] is the ideal tech for those looking to make some cash, giving a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT] to the first to discover it, while additionally giving every city an extra Trade Route and allowing the construction of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Bank[COLOR_REVERT] Building.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]货币[COLOR_REVERT]是增加财富积累的重要科技，率先发现该项科技将获得一位[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大商业家[COLOR_REVERT]，每座城市额外增加一条商路，并启用 [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]银行[COLOR_REVERT]建筑。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Militarism[COLOR_REVERT] eases the task of the conqueror, allowing Units to move more quickly over Roads, providing a free [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great General[COLOR_REVERT] to to first to research it and also giving a massive (but costly) boost to military production through the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Professional Army[COLOR_REVERT] Civic.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]兵家[COLOR_REVERT]科技适用于军事征服路线，允许单位以更快的速度沿道路机动，率先发现该项科技将获得一位[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大军事家[COLOR_REVERT]，并启用 [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]职业军队[COLOR_REVERT]内政法令，可以大大加速军队建设。

TEXT.English: A cultured tech with internal improvement in mind, [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Calligraphy[COLOR_REVERT] gives a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT] to the first to discover, unlocks the Production-boosting and Maintenance-reducing [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]State Property[COLOR_REVERT] Civic, and the Happiness-based [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Theatre[COLOR_REVERT] Building.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]书法[COLOR_REVERT]属于文化类科技，率先发现该项科技将获得一位 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]，启用可提升产能并降低维护费的[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]国营经济[COLOR_REVERT]内政法令，以及增加快乐度的 [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]剧场[COLOR_REVERT]建筑。

TEXT.English: Important for economic purposes, the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Construction[COLOR_REVERT] tech provides a free [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT] Unit to the first to research it, bridges all rivers (so that they won't stop movement when traveling via road) and allows the building of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Underground Tomb[COLOR_REVERT] National Wonder, which reduces War Weariness and provides free Specialists to all cities.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]建筑构造学[COLOR_REVERT]是重要的经济类科技，率先发现该项科技将获得一位[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]，允许道路通过桥梁跨越河流（过河不消耗移动力），启用国家级奇观[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]地下陵墓[COLOR_REVERT]，可以减少厌战情绪，并使所有城市额外获得免费专业人员。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Machinery[COLOR_REVERT] is an important military tech, unlocking the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Catapult[COLOR_REVERT] Siege unit, the War Weariness-reducing and production-providing [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Absolutism[COLOR_REVERT] Civic, and finally the scientific [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Observatory[COLOR_REVERT] Building.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]机械[COLOR_REVERT]是重要的军事类科技，启用攻城类武器[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]投石车[COLOR_REVERT]，以及可以减少厌战情绪并提升工业产能的 [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]中央集权[COLOR_REVERT]内政法令，并允许建造 [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]天文台[COLOR_REVERT]。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Legalism[COLOR_REVERT] is for the iron-fisted general. The Civic of the same name gives a huge bonus to experience at the cost of Happiness, while also allowing the construction of the improved anti-Melee [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Crossbowman II[COLOR_REVERT] Unit.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]法家[COLOR_REVERT]适用于倾向铁腕统治的玩家。同名的内政法令可以增加不满为代价使单位获得额外经验值，并启用克制肉搏单位的[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]弩手II[COLOR_REVERT]。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Meritocracy[COLOR_REVERT] tech is very important for economics and diplomacy. It unlocks the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Educated Elite[COLOR_REVERT] Civic, providing 2 free Specialists to all cities as well as the science-boosting [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]University[COLOR_REVERT] Building. But its most important facet is that it allows the building of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Emperor's Council[COLOR_REVERT] World Wonder, which puts the Diplomatic Victory condition in play.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]贤士[COLOR_REVERT]科技具有重要的经济和外交意义。启用 [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]专职劳工[COLOR_REVERT]内政法令，所有城市增加2位免费专业人员，并允许建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]大学[COLOR_REVERT]。最关键的一点是启用通向外交胜利的世界级奇观 [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]会盟台[COLOR_REVERT]。

TEXT.English: A military tech, [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Independent Cavalry[COLOR_REVERT] increases the movement rate of Naval units by 1, but more importantly unlocks the very powerful [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Heavy Cavalry II[COLOR_REVERT] Mounted Unit.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]骑射[COLOR_REVERT]属于军事类科技，可使海上单位移动力+1，并启用强大的[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]骑射手II[COLOR_REVERT]单位。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Mohism[COLOR_REVERT] has a dual use: for the economy-minded it allows the usage of the Civic option of the same name which provides a huge boost to research. Additionally, it allows the building of the ultimate anti-Mounted Unit, the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Polearm III[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]墨家[COLOR_REVERT]科技具有双重作用：在经济领域可通过同名内政法令大大提升科研实力。而且允许组建克制骑兵的终极单位[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]矛兵III[COLOR_REVERT]。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Water Works[COLOR_REVERT] technology is all about growth. It allows the creation of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Farm[COLOR_REVERT] plot Improvements without Irrigation or a source of fresh water, but more importantly increases the amount of Food produced by all [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Farms[COLOR_REVERT] by 1.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]水产[COLOR_REVERT]属于发展类科技。无须灌溉或邻近淡水即可修建 [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]农场[COLOR_REVERT]设施，更重要的是可使所有 [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]农场[COLOR_REVERT]的食物产出+1。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Steel[COLOR_REVERT] is among the final military techs, unlocking the City-devastating [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Swordsman II[COLOR_REVERT], while also providing extra production when Forests are cleared by Workers.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]炼钢[COLOR_REVERT]是终极军事类科技，启用专业攻城单位 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]剑士II[COLOR_REVERT]，并允许工人砍伐森林获得额外工业产能。

TEXT.English: [NEWLINE][BOLD]Diplomacy:[\BOLD][PARAGRAPH:2]In this scenario, diplomacy is the key to success - whether you're leading a group of Civs into victory or are the target of everyone else is determined by your relations with the states you share the map with. Everyone is out to win control of China, and getting your neighbors to work with you rather than eye you suspiciously will be difficult. But you have a powerful tool: your [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Family Bloodline[COLOR_REVERT].[PARAGRAPH:2]Your Family Bloodline (that is, your Religion) is your way of manipulating neighboring states into becoming your friends and allies. Acquiring Open Borders and then sending your [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Family Emissaries[COLOR_REVERT] (Missionaries) is an important way of spreading your influence. But sometimes other Civs won't even be willing to grant you access to their territory. While troublesome, there remains a tactic available: you may change your OWN State Bloodline to match THEIRS. This will provide an immediate boost in relations which will give you an opening to more fruitful cooperation in the future. This may even be done many times to befriend multiple Civs, but beware the impact of this maneuver on your current allies![PARAGRAPH:2]Victory is possible through Diplomacy, as well as by Conquest and (if the time limit is reached) by Score. Winning in this way requires constructing the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Emperor's Council[COLOR_REVERT] World Wonder. Once built, two votes will be held, one to determine the Council Leader and then for who should become the Emperor of China. The Council Leader will always be one of the two possible candidates for becoming Emperor. It is possible for no one to be elected or even to lose, so manage the relations with your friends and foes carefully![NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Battle:[\BOLD][PARAGRAPH:2]Compared with warfare in a normal game of Civilization 4, combat in this scenario may seem to be quite a bit more difficult to handle. This was an era of history very much focused on defense and the use of massive armies to achieve small gains. But there are ways to avoid losing scores of men over minor objectives.[PARAGRAPH:2]As with a normal game, [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Swordsmen[COLOR_REVERT] are important for killing City defenders. Bombardment of enemy strongholds to wear down their defenses is vital for capturing them. [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Catapults[COLOR_REVERT] are not available until somewhat late in the game, but the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Galley[COLOR_REVERT] Naval Unit is able to Bombard cities from the many navigable rivers which flow through China. Use them wisely and you will be rewarded.[PARAGRAPH:2]One final warning: If on the periphery of civilization, beware Barbarian attacks!
TEXT.Chinese: [NEWLINE][BOLD]外交：[\BOLD][PARAGRAPH:2]在本剧情中，外交是获得胜利的关键——你与天下各国的关系决定你是成为众望所归，还是成为众矢之的。每个国家的最终目标都是一统天下，要使你的邻居与你通力合作而不是相互猜忌，是一项非常困难的任务。不过你掌握着一个强大的力量：你的[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]家族血脉[COLOR_REVERT]。[PARAGRAPH:2]你的家族血脉（亦即你的“宗教信仰”）的传播是使邻国成为你的盟友的重要手段。签订开放边界条约，派遣[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]家族使节[COLOR_REVERT]（“传教士”）不断扩大你的家族的影响力。但不时其他国家可能禁止你进入他们的领地。你可以考虑采取如下的策略：将本国所尊奉的家族血脉改为同对方一致！这样可以极大提升双方的关系水平，打开通向友好合作的大门。你甚至可以多次改变“家族血脉”再同其他国家搞好关系，但小心不要惹怒你现在的盟友！[PARAGRAPH:2]胜利可能通过外交途径获得，当然也可以通过军事征服，或是在游戏时间结束时赢得积分胜利。外交胜利需要建造世界级奇观[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]会盟台[COLOR_REVERT]。建成会盟台之后将进行两次投票，第一次投票是推选盟主，第二次投票则是推选天子（中国皇帝）。盟主将成为天子的候选者之一。要想成为众望所归的中国皇帝，就要谨慎选择自己的朋友和敌人！[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]战斗：[\BOLD][PARAGRAPH:2]与文明IV标准游戏模式相比，在本剧情中进行战斗更为困难。当时的战争偏重与防御，发动大规模的军事行动往往也只能夺得很小的目标。因此玩家最好避免这样得不偿失的做法，采取其他手段实现目的。[PARAGRAPH:2]与标准游戏模式类似，[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]剑士[COLOR_REVERT]是用于攻城的重要力量。为占领敌城应该首先通过轰击破坏城防。[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]投石车[COLOR_REVERT]要到游戏后期才能建造，但[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]桨帆船[COLOR_REVERT]可以沿纵横交错的河流深入内陆轰击城市。要好好利用你的水军。[PARAGRAPH:2]最后还有一个警告：如果地处文明的边缘地带，小心蛮族的入侵！

TEXT.English: Random map generator does not place any tribal villages ("goody huts") on the map
TEXT.Chinese: 随机地图时不添加任何部落村庄("磨菇房")

TEXT.English: Naval Units can only be purchased when the camp unit is adjacent to water.
TEXT.Chinese: 游牧营地必须位于海滨方可购买海上单位.
你需要%d1_Num金币以购买晋升: %s2_PromotionName.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Advanced Sailing[COLOR_REVERT] allows the creation of the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Trireme[COLOR_REVERT] naval unit and the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Drydock[COLOR_REVERT] building.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]先进航行术[COLOR_REVERT]启用[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]三层桨战船[COLOR_REVERT]单位以及[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]干船坞[COLOR_REVERT]建筑。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Improved Formations I[COLOR_REVERT] allows the creation of the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Hoplite[COLOR_REVERT] unit, which is superior to the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Spearman.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]改良阵形I[COLOR_REVERT]启用[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]重装矛兵[COLOR_REVERT]单位，其战斗力强于普通的[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]矛兵[COLOR_REVERT]。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Improved Formations II[COLOR_REVERT] allows the creation of the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Phalanx[COLOR_REVERT] unit, which is superior to the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Spearman[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Hoplite[COLOR_REVERT]. It also allows construction of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Military Encampment[COLOR_REVERT] building, which increases ground units' experience.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]改良阵形II[COLOR_REVERT]启用[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]希腊方阵兵[COLOR_REVERT]单位，其战斗力强于[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]矛兵[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]重装矛兵[COLOR_REVERT]。并允许建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]军事宿营地[COLOR_REVERT]建筑，可以提升陆上单位的经验值。

TEXT.English: %D1: "We are worried about our rivals being vassals to your empire!"
TEXT.Chinese: %D1: "你们将我们的敌人收为附庸!"

TEXT.English: Sorry, it's out of our hands.
Would you like to ransom this city back to its original owner? (If you attack a city you have previously ransomed, no one will accept your ransom offer in the future.)
TEXT.Chinese: 你要用此城市向原所有者换取赎金吗？（如果你再次攻击支付过赎金的城市，将来其他城市将不再同意支付赎金。）

TEXT.English: You have been paid a ransom of %d1 gold.
TEXT.Chinese: 你获得了%d1金币作为赎金。

TEXT.English: [H1]Great Generals[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Great Generals are military leaders that emerge as your civilization gains combat experience. When you have won enough battles to reach a certain threshold of total experience, a [LINK=UNIT_GREAT_GENERAL]Great General[\LINK] appears in one of your cities. Each Great General requires twice the amount of combat experience that was needed to generate the one before.[PARAGRAPH:2]Once generated, you can turn your Great General into a Warlord by joining him with another unit in the field. That action also distributes a one-time experience bonus to units in the same tile. The unit receiving the Warlord can be upgraded at no cost, and retains all of its experience when doing so. The unit also gains access to some special promotions not normally available, such as [LINK=PROMOTION_COMBAT6]Combat VI[\LINK], [LINK=PROMOTION_MEDIC3]Medic III[\LINK], [LINK=PROMOTION_TACTICS]Tactics[\LINK], [LINK=PROMOTION_LEADERSHIP]Leadership[\LINK], and [LINK=PROMOTION_MORALE]Morale[\LINK].[PARAGRAPH:2]Alternatively, you can use your Great General to construct a [LINK=BUILDING_MILITARY_ACADEMY]military academy[\LINK] in a city. That city receives a production bonus when building military units.[PARAGRAPH:2]Finally, a Great General can join a city as a [LINK=SPECIALIST_GREAT_GENERAL]Great Military Instructor[\LINK]. New units constructed in that city immediately receive bonus experience points.
TEXT.Chinese: [H1]大军事家[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]大军事家将随你的军队作战经验的不断积累应运而生。当你赢得足够多的战斗，积累了足够多的经验值，一位[LINK=UNIT_GREAT_GENERAL]大军事家[\LINK]将出现在你的某座城市中。而出现下一位大军事家所需的经验值将是原先的两倍。[PARAGRAPH:2]大军事家出现后，你可以将其作为“军事统帅”指挥特定的作战单位。这将使得同一地块的所有单位获得一次性经验值奖励。与军事统帅合体的单位将可以免费升级，并在升级后保持其原有经验值，该单位还将获得几项特殊的晋升类型，例如[LINK=PROMOTION_COMBAT6]格斗六级[\LINK]，[LINK=PROMOTION_MEDIC3]医疗三级[\LINK]，[LINK=PROMOTION_TACTICS] 战术机动[\LINK]，[LINK=PROMOTION_LEADERSHIP]领导能力[\LINK]以及[LINK=PROMOTION_MORALE]激励士气[\LINK]。[PARAGRAPH:2]此外，你可以选择让大军事家在城市中建造一座[LINK=BUILDING_MILITARY_ACADEMY]军事学院[\LINK]，该城市将更能快速地组建军事单位。[PARAGRAPH:2]最后，大军事家还能加入城市作为[LINK=SPECIALIST_GREAT_GENERAL]军事理论家[\LINK]，该城市新组建的单位将获得额外经验点数奖励。

TEXT.English: [H1]Vassal States[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]A vassal state is one that has sworn allegiance to another state, providing its master state with some benefits in exchange for the master's pledge to protect and promote the vassal's welfare. [PARAGRAPH:2][H2]Benefits of Vassal Agreements[\H2][PARAGRAPH:2]A vassal agreement results in some extra [LINK=CONCEPT_HAPPINESS]happiness[\LINK] throughout the master's empire, as well as some unhappiness for the vassal.[PARAGRAPH:2]Other benefits for the master include a right of passage through vassal territory, and visibility inside all vassal cities. In addition, the master's units heal as fast as they heal in his own territory, and can take full advantage of the vassal's fortifications.[PARAGRAPH:2]The master has the right to demand access to any [LINK=CONCEPT_RESOURCES]resource[\LINK] under vassal control, even if it is their only one. However, there is one catch. If the vassal refuses to pay this tribute, the agreement immediately ends and a state of [LINK=CONCEPT_WAR]war[\LINK] automatically results between the two parties. That is the only case where a state of war can result between a master state and a vassal state. Normally, the two parties are prevented from attacking each other and in addition if the master goes to war against a third party, the vassal automatically enters the war on the side of the master. Vassal states do not have the power to declare war or make peace on their own.[PARAGRAPH:2][H2]Cost of Vassal Agreements[\H2][PARAGRAPH:2]When possessing vassals, the Master civilization incurs a higher [LINK=CONCEPT_MAINTENANCE]maintenance[\LINK] cost for its own cities. This costs increases as the number of vassal cities under his control increases. (Note that the master doesn't pay maintenance for the vassal's cities - he just pays extra maintenance for his civ's cities.)[PARAGRAPH:2][H2]Types of Vassal Agreements[\H2][PARAGRAPH:2]During peace time, a civilization can offer to become a vassal of a more powerful civilization with knowledge of [LINK=TECH_FEUDALISM]Feudalism[\LINK]. This is a temporary agreement that can be broken by the vassal (but not by the master) after 10 turns. For this type of peaceful vassalage, when the agreement is signed, any civilization at war with either of the two parties at is automatically at war with both parties.[PARAGRAPH:2]During wartime, a vassal agreement results in capitulation. [BOLD]Capitulation[\BOLD] has the same effects as peaceful vassalage, but it cannot be broken by the vassal state even after 10 turns, unless the vassal state grows to more than half of the land area and population of the master state. Capitulation may also be annulled by the vassal if the vassal state loses half of its land area since the time the agreement was signed. Capitulation forces the vassal state to immediately adopt the master's war/peace state against third parties.[PARAGRAPH:2][H2]Victory Conditions[\H2][PARAGRAPH:2]In terms of [LINK=CONCEPT_VICTORY]victory conditions[\LINK] and score, the master state gets credit for half of the land and population of the vassal state and the vassal state gets credit for the other half. (Note, however, that acquiring vassals is not a necessarily a ticket to an easy domination victory, because the higher [LINK=CONCEPT_MAINTENANCE]maintenance[\LINK] cost for your own cities [see above] may drag your economy to a halt.)
TEXT.Chinese: [H1]附庸国[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]附庸国是臣服并效忠于其他国家的半独立政权，附庸国向其宗主国提供贡礼，以换取宗主国在军事上提供保护。[PARAGRAPH:2][H2]附庸条约的作用 [\H2][PARAGRAPH:2]附庸条约可使宗主国城市获得额外的[LINK=CONCEPT_HAPPINESS]快乐[\LINK]，同时导致附庸国城市的不满。[PARAGRAPH:2]宗主国可获得的其他好处还包括：拥有附庸国领土的通行权，能够察看附庸国的城市。此外，宗主国的单位在附庸国领土中的恢复能力与在本国相同，并能利用附庸国的防御设施。[PARAGRAPH:2]宗主国有权要求获取附庸国的任何 [LINK=CONCEPT_RESOURCES]资源[\LINK]，甚至是其唯一的资源。但是，如果附庸国拒绝提供这样的贡礼，附庸条约即告失效，双方自动进入[LINK=CONCEPT_WAR]战争[\LINK]状态。这是宗主国与附庸国之间发生战争唯一可能的原因。通常，附庸条约将确保双方互不侵犯，如果宗主国与别国发生战争，附庸国将自动加入宗主国一方作战。附庸国本身则无权向其他国家宣战或提出和约。[PARAGRAPH:2][H2]附庸条约的代价[\H2][PARAGRAPH:2]在拥有附庸的情况下，宗主国的城市[LINK=CONCEPT_MAINTENANCE]维护费[\LINK]将会增加。附庸国拥有的城市越多，宗主国的城市维护费就越高。（宗主国无须为附庸国的城市支付维护费——只是需要为自己的城市额外支付维护费）[PARAGRAPH:2][H2]附庸条约的类型[\H2][PARAGRAPH:2]在和平时期，某个文明可以提出成为另一个强大文明的附庸国，对方文明必须已掌握[LINK=TECH_FEUDALISM]封建制度[\LINK]。此项条约是有时效性的，附庸国可以在10回合之后废除附庸条约（宗主国无权这样做）。这种和平附庸条约签订之后，第三方向其中任何一方宣战将视同与双方同时宣战。[PARAGRAPH:2]在战争期间签订附庸条约意味着屈膝投降。[BOLD]投降[\BOLD]与和平附庸效果相同，但附庸国无权在10回合后结束附庸关系，除非附庸国的领土和人口规模达到并超过宗主国领土和人口规模的半数。投降条约签订后，如果附庸国再丧失超过半数的领土，也能够解除附庸关系。投降条约将使附庸国随宗国主自动进入同第三方的战争/和平状态。[PARAGRAPH:2][H2]胜利条件[\H2][PARAGRAPH:2]在对[LINK=CONCEPT_VICTORY]胜利条件[\LINK]和积分的影响方面，宗主国被视作拥有附庸国半数的领土和人口，即附庸国只拥有本国领土和人口的半数。（但是，签订附庸条约不一定使获得支配胜利变得更容易，因为高昂的城市[LINK=CONCEPT_MAINTENANCE]维护费[\LINK]可能导致本国经济陷于停滞。）

TEXT.English: [H1]Irrigation[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2][LINK=IMPROVEMENT_FARM]Farms[\LINK] require irrigation in order to provide their full [LINK=CONCEPT_FOOD]food[\LINK] benefits. Irrigation can be achieved by building the farm adjacent to a source of fresh water, like a river, lake, or oasis.[PARAGRAPH:2][LINK=TECH_CIVIL_SERVICE]Civil Service[\LINK] enables irrigated farms to become a source of irrigation themselves. That allows you to bring irrigation to distant locations by building a chain of farms from the source of fresh water.[PARAGRAPH:2]With the advent of [LINK=TECH_BIOLOGY]Biology[\LINK], Farms no longer require irrigation.
TEXT.Chinese: [H1]灌溉[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]需要为[LINK=IMPROVEMENT_FARM]农场[\LINK]设施提供灌溉，才能使其最大限度地产出[LINK=CONCEPT_FOOD]食物[\LINK]。农场的位置邻近淡水（例如河流、湖泊或绿洲）即视为具有灌溉条件。[PARAGRAPH:2][LINK=TECH_CIVIL_SERVICE]文官制度[\LINK]内政法令可使获得灌溉的农场可以视同灌溉水源。亦即允许通过“农场”链将淡水引到远处提供灌溉。[PARAGRAPH:2]获得[LINK=TECH_BIOLOGY]生物学[\LINK]科技后，农场不再需要灌溉条件即可提供最大产出。

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Acts as a city for combat purposes

[BOLD]Scoring:[\BOLD][NEWLINE]Points in this scenario are earned through controlling Victory Resources. For every Victory Resource you control, you will earn 10 points per turn. When the game begins, each opposing Civilization controls a single Victory Resource, while your Civilization controls none. In order to win, you must capture at least 2 Victory Resources before your opponent's score gets too far ahead of your score. Good Luck!
TEXT.Chinese: [BOLD]积分：[\BOLD][NEWLINE]本剧情游戏的积分是通过控制“胜利资源”来获得的。每控制一个胜利资源，你每回合将获得10点积分。游戏开始时，其他文明各控制一个胜利资源，你的文明则没有胜利资源。要赢得胜利，你必须在对手的积分远远超过你之前至少占据2个胜利资源。祝你好运！

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Research Treasure Location[COLOR_REVERT] will reveal the location of a capturable treasure unit every time it is researched.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]宝藏位置研究[COLOR_REVERT]每完成一次，将揭示一个宝藏所在的位置。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Longboats[COLOR_REVERT] are fast Viking ships that can transport 2 units.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]维京战船[COLOR_REVERT]是高航速的维京海船，可以运载2个单位。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Duns[COLOR_REVERT], the Celtic replacements for [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Walls[COLOR_REVERT], increase a city's defenses against pre-gunpowder units, and gives all eligible units built in this city the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Guerrilla I[COLOR_REVERT] promotion.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]丘堡[COLOR_REVERT]是凯尔特的特色建筑，替代[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]城墙[COLOR_REVERT]，可提升城市防御冷兵器时代单位的能力，并使所在城市新组建的单位自动获得[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]游击一级[COLOR_REVERT]晋升。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Citadels[COLOR_REVERT], the Spanish replacements for [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Castles[COLOR_REVERT], increase a city's defenses against pre-gunpowder units, and gives new siege units built there some extra experience.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]城防要塞[COLOR_REVERT]是西班牙的特色建筑，替代[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]城堡[COLOR_REVERT]，可提升城市防御冷兵器时代单位的能力，并使所在城市新组建的压制武器获得额外经验值。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ikhandas[COLOR_REVERT], the Zulu replacements for [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Baracks[COLOR_REVERT], grant experience points to troops built in their cities, and lower city maintenance costs.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]特训兵营[COLOR_REVERT]是祖鲁的特色建筑，替代[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]兵营[COLOR_REVERT]，可使所在城市新组建的单位获得额外经验值，并减少城市维护费。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Gers[COLOR_REVERT], the Mongol replacements for [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Stables[COLOR_REVERT], provide your mounted units with even more experience than [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Stables[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]毡帐[COLOR_REVERT]是蒙古的特色建筑，替代[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]马厩[COLOR_REVERT]，可使所在城市新组建的骑乘单位获得的经验值比[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]马厩[COLOR_REVERT]所提供的更多。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Terraces[COLOR_REVERT], the Incan replacements for [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Granaries[COLOR_REVERT], provide a small amount of culture and store food to help increase a city's growth rate. They add additional health if your civ has access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Corn[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wheat[COLOR_REVERT], and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rice[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]梯田[COLOR_REVERT]是印加的特色建筑，替代[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]粮仓[COLOR_REVERT]，可提供少量文化点数，并能储存食物加速城市人口增长。如果拥有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]玉米[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]小麦[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]稻米[COLOR_REVERT]还可提供额外健康点数。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hammam[COLOR_REVERT], the Ottoman replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Aqueduct[COLOR_REVERT], improves a city's happiness and health. Build [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hammams[COLOR_REVERT] when you want to grow a city, or when the populace begins clamoring for it.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]土耳其浴室[COLOR_REVERT]是奥斯曼的特色建筑，替代[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]引水渠[COLOR_REVERT]，可提升城市的快乐度和健康度。在城市规模需要扩大或是市民的提出要求时建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]土耳其浴室[COLOR_REVERT]。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Trading Post[COLOR_REVERT], the Viking replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Lighthouse[COLOR_REVERT], improves the food output of water plots and gives the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Navigation I[COLOR_REVERT] to ships built in that city.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]贸易据点[COLOR_REVERT]是维京的特色建筑，替代[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]灯塔[COLOR_REVERT]，可提升城市水域的食物产出，并使城市组建的船只自动获得[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]导航一级[COLOR_REVERT]晋升。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Cothon[COLOR_REVERT], the Carthaginian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Harbor[COLOR_REVERT], significantly increases that city's income from trade routes. It increases a city's health from access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Clam[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Crab[COLOR_REVERT], and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fish[COLOR_REVERT] resources.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]巨港[COLOR_REVERT]是迦太基的特色建筑，替代[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]港口[COLOR_REVERT]，可提升城市从商路获得的收入。如果拥有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]蛤蜊[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]螃蟹[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]鱼群[COLOR_REVERT]还可额外提供健康点数。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mint[COLOR_REVERT], the Mali replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Forge[COLOR_REVERT], provides a small increase in wealth, allows a city to produce units and buildings faster, but also adds unhealthiness in cities.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]铸币厂[COLOR_REVERT]是马里的特色建筑，替代[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]煅造场[COLOR_REVERT]，可增加城市财富积累，使城市建造单位和建筑的速度更快，但也会增加城市的疾病点数。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Assembly Plants[COLOR_REVERT], the German replacements for [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Factories[COLOR_REVERT], increase a city's production at the cost of adding significant unhealthiness. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Assembly Plants[COLOR_REVERT] are required to build [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Coal[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hydro[COLOR_REVERT], or [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Nuclear Plants[COLOR_REVERT], which add additional production with the proper resources.
